topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5499b57963687260b92c0100#post_5499b57963687260b92c0100
I'm weird about fashion.
I get it and I understands the basic elements of fashion. And I try to look as good as a I can when I go out. I tend to use complimenting colors and patterns. Hell I learned early on that I look best in more muted colors as opposed to bright and flashy colors.  But I do it more for myself than trying to impress anyone. When I look good I feel good.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
